Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay at the Kleber”
Reviews.Author: FrancesLargs
Reviews.Content: spent 5 enjoyable days kleber brilliant location walk significant land marks etc bonus travelling public transport metro bus airport bus doorstep staff friendly informative breakfast adequate fresh tasty loved informal nature hotel bit disappointed lack satellite service especially evenings sightseeing day little energy left overall thoroughly enjoyed stay kleber hotel hope time soon

Reviews.Title: “Great location, beautiful hotel, but tiny bedroom.”
Reviews.Author: Karl013
Reviews.Content: hotel conveniently located 5 minute walk arc de triomphe numerous cafes restaurants nearby hotel reception nicely decorated staff reception friendly helpful bedroom bathroom tiny paris charming surrounding streets quiet evening kleber metro stop near arc de triomphe close metro stop wasnt difficult town
